issue.title: [Developer] Remove run_docker_compose.sh
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6511](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6511). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
dev/run_docker_compose.sh and Makefile.docker perform fundamentally the same function: run docker-compose conveniently. Consolidating them is probably worthwhile, and since Makefile.docker also builds dependencies it seems the natural choice.

update dev/README.md as well

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6511?focusedCommentId=16974216) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
It seems the script was removed in the meantime.
